title: "Non-monotonous DTS in output stream" ?
body:

Although processing has been finished, there is a lag in the output video. It seems to freeze at around 3rd second for a around two seconds. My settings were: Scale ratio: 2, Threads: 1, Method cuDNN, Driver: Waifu2x Caffe.

Best regards!
